meta.title: Adventure Capitalist Hole Game | Build Your Empire
meta.description: Dive into Adventure Capitalist Hole Game, manage resources, dig deep, and build your business empire to riches.

hero.title: Welcome to Adventure Capitalist Hole Game
hero.description: Dig your way to fortune, manage your capital wisely, and expand your business empire in this addictive idle adventure.

items.title: Start Digging
items.description: Begin with small investments and carefully plan your resource management to grow your capital.

items.title: Invest Smartly
items.description: Use profits to upgrade your equipment and unlock new opportunities to maximize your earnings.

items.title: Become a Tycoon
items.description: Grow your business empire, dominate the market, and become the ultimate capitalist mogul.

blockscape.title: Your Capitalist World
blockscape.content:
Unlimited Growth

Expand your holdings and explore endless ways to multiply your wealth in the capitalist hole.

Strategic Management

Every investment counts. Make smart decisions to optimize profits and beat the competition.

craftingGrounds.title: Upgrade Workshop
craftingGrounds.content:
Master Your Upgrades

Combine resources to improve your mining tools, speed up production, and unlock powerful boosts.

From basic drills to advanced machinery, upgrades are key to your success in the hole.

biomeExplorer.title: Mining Zones
biomeExplorer.content:
Surface Plains

Start your digging journey in the fertile plains filled with basic resources.

Rocky Caves

Explore deeper caves rich with minerals and hidden treasures.

Volcanic Depths

Brave the heat and find rare ores in the fiery underground.

Crystal Caverns

Discover sparkling crystals and valuable gems to boost your profits.

items.text: Adventure Capitalist Hole Game hooked me instantly! Watching my empire grow is so satisfying!

items.text: The upgrade system is addictive, and managing my resources keeps me coming back for more.
